Worktags_Tax_Rule_Line_Data.description: Element containing Tax Rate Recoverabilities data for Tax Code.

validation.validation: Provide Tax Rates that match the Tax Code
Cannot select Recoverable Recoverabilities when using a Non-Taxable Applicability, [applicability]. [SUBJECT TO CHANGE]
Must select a Tax Option for each Tax Rate in the selected Tax Code
You can't enter a Tax Option for this type of transaction.
You must select a Tax Option of Calculate Self-Assessed Tax or Calculate Tax Due to Supplier for a Tax Rate.
Must select a Tax Recoverability for each Tax Rate in the selected Tax Code
You can't enter a Tax Recoverability for this type of transaction.
The tax option doesn't apply to a transaction tax rule for items when revenue is the tax rule type.
The tax recoverability doesn't apply to a transaction tax rule for items when revenue is the tax rule type.

Worktags_Tax_Rule_Data.description: Element containing information for Tax Rule for Worktag information at the line level.

validation.validation: Specify at least one tax override on your worktag tax rule line.
Only one worktag of each type is allowed
Specify at least one worktag for each worktag tax rule line.
A worktag tax rule line with this worktag combination already exists.  Specify a unique worktag combination for each worktag tax rule line.
Specify a line order for each worktag tax rule line.
You can reference a worktag tax rule line only if it belongs to the specified worktag tax rule.

description: Element containing information for the Tax Rule for Worktag instance.

validation.validation: Specify a unique name for each worktag tax rule.
